module.name: thickened_face_solid
module.purpose: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module for the definition of solids created by thickening a face. The face is topologically bounded and has fully defined geometry. The material added may be on one, or both, sides of the original face.

inscope.li: solids created by adding material to one, or both, sides of a face.

li.p: solids produced by extruding a planar face.
li.note: Swept solids, including extruded solids are defined in the application module swept solid.

uof.name: Thickened_Face_Solid
uof.description: The Thickened_Face_Solid UoF specifies the data structure for the description of solids created by thickening a bounded face. The face is required to conform to the specification of an advanced face with fully defined geometry and explicit topology defining the boundaries. Thickening may be defined on one or both sides of the face.
